addr: 525 Lexington Avenue. (at 49th Street). New York, NY 10017
title: Spectrum of Light - New York
desc:
Join Alma Lasers... 
 ....and  Dr. Jason Bloom  as we explore the latest advances in aesthetic treatments. Gain valuable insight into applications such as virtually painless hair removal, the latest breakthroughs in RF technology and Alma's newest multi-application device the  Harmony XL PRO.  
 As an added bonus, attendees can also learn more about Alma's minimally invasive solution for feminine health concerns,  FemiLift . This portion of the event features FemiLift provider  Dr. Oscar Aguirre.  
 
 Plus, learn marketing strategies to grow your practice from  Kevin Mendell ,  Alma's Strategic Marketing Director . 
 Valet parking is complimentary for our guests.
